name.ja: Auto Tab Groups サイドパネル
name.zh_CN: 标签页自动分组侧边栏

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌟 Auto Tab Groups - Your Ultimate Browser Tab Management Tool 🚀

Do you often feel overwhelmed by countless open tabs while browsing? Auto Tab Groups is a smart extension designed to help you organize and manage your browser tabs effortlessly. It automatically groups similar tabs, keeping your browsing environment clean and organized, and significantly boosting your productivity.

✨ Why Choose Auto Tab Groups?
🛠️ Tackle Tab Clutter: Smart grouping makes it easy to manage multiple tabs, saving you time and effort.
🎯 Stay Focused: Organize tabs by topic to reduce distractions and focus on what matters most.
⏱️ Save Time: No need to manually organize tabs; the extension does it all for you with one click.
🔑 Key Features
🤖 Smart Grouping: Automatically analyzes tab content and organizes them into topic-based groups.
🎨 Custom Rules: Set your own grouping rules to meet your specific needs.
✍️ Easy Management: Quickly create, edit, or delete tab groups with an intuitive interface.
⚙️ Personalized Settings: Customize grouping logic and display styles to match your preferences.

🧑‍💻 Who Is It For?
🏢 Professionals: Manage multiple work-related tabs efficiently.
📚 Students: Organize research and study materials by topic for better learning.
💻 Developers: Group tabs by project to streamline workflows.
✅ Install Auto Tab Groups Now and Enjoy an Organized Browsing Experience!

Say goodbye to tab chaos and hello to a clean, efficient browser that helps you accomplish more every day.
